description: '''Bulbuljan''' ({{langx|az|Bülbülcan}}), born as '''Abdulbagi Ali oglu Zulalov''' (1841–1927), was an [[Azerbaijan]]i singer of [[folk music]] and [[mugam]] (an original improvisational genre of classical folk music in [[Azerbaijan]]). He was also famous for his performance of Azeri mugams in other regional languages, such as [[Georgian language|Georgian]], [[Lezgian language|Lezgian]], [[Kumyk language|Kumyk]], [[Persian language|Persian]], and [[Russian language|Russian]].
